import './allPages.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios" export const Login=()=>{ let navigate= useNavigate(); const handleHomeClick=()=>{ navigate('/'); } const handleReesetClick=()=>{ navigate('/resetPassword') } const validate=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() let username=document.getElementById('login_username').value axios.post('http://localhost:5000/loginServer',{ username }) .then(res=>{console.log(res)}) .catch(err=>{console.log(err)}) } return (
